thumb.name: Joy to You!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ELatonya...%3Cbr%3EMay the love of family and the heritage we share%3Cbr%3Elight the way with happiness and pride%3Cbr%3Efor generations to come.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EKwanzaa joy%3Cbr%3Eto you!

thumb.name: Truth and Spirit
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3ENakia. let the first fruits of the harvest spark a new beginning. Let the Nguzo Saba guide you and inspire you towards greater understanding. Let the joy of Umoja fill your heart as a recommitment of faith.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3ELet the truth and spirit of the season stay with you through the year. Happy Kwanzaa%3Cbr%3E
